text: Iraj Dastgerdi (; born 31 December 1955) is an Iranian fencer. He competed in the individual and team épée events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Iran Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Iraj Dastgerdi
